Objects

Class Boid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Objects.Boid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Boid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class for the boid Contains constants for the rules and some transient JavaFX objects so it is not serialized
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Updates position of the boid

        flock - The current server flock

      • cohesion

        private Vector2 cohesion(Flock flock)
        Makes the boids move to center of mass of all other boids
        Parameters:
        flock - Current flock on server
        Returns:
        A vector to the perceived center

      • separation

        private Vector2 separation(Flock flock)
        Separates the boid from other nearby boids
        Parameters:
        flock - Current server flock
        Returns:
        A vector away from the nearest boids

      • alignment

        private Vector2 alignment(Flock flock)
        Adjusts velocity according to nearby boids
        Parameters:
        flock - Current server flock
        Returns:
        A vector with the average speed of all nearby boids

        Avoid the edges of the window

        Parameters:

        Sets the JavaFX objects to the updated values

      • getRandomRange

        private Vector2 getRandomRange(double min,
                               double max)
        Used to place the boid on a random position on the screen
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum spawn value
        max - Maximum spawn value
        Returns:
